remarks: The determinant function is alternating regarding rows (matrix is given explicitly by its entries).  (Contributed by SO, 16-Jul-2018.)
statement:
mdetralt2.d $e |- D = ( N maDet R ) $.
mdetralt2.k $e |- K = ( Base ` R ) $.

mdetralt2.n $e |- ( ph -> N e. Fin ) $.
mdetralt2.x $e |- ( ( ph /\ j e. N ) -> X e. K ) $.
mdetralt2.y $e |- ( ( ph /\ i e. N /\ j e. N ) -> Y e. K ) $.
mdetralt2.i $e |- ( ph -> I e. N ) $.
mdetralt2.j $e |- ( ph -> J e. N ) $.
mdetralt2.ij $e |- ( ph -> I =/= J ) $.
mdetralt2 $p |- ( ph -> ( D ` ( i e. N , j e. N |-> if ( i = I , X , if ( i = J , X , Y ) ) ) ) = .0. ) $.
